answers.answer: Your profile says you are 38 so that means that 10 years have passed since you went into menopause.  I was near to 30 when I went into surgical menopause and can relate to your situation.Have you made an appointment with your doctor to have a blood panel worked up to check for diabetes or thyroid problems, both of which play havoc with metabolism .A doctors appointment is always a good place to start and your medical provider can also point you in the direction of a dietician if you need to find out more about your diet or a diet.Good luck to youM

question: Hi, I went through menopause at a very young age. I gained a lot of weight, a lot of which was my fault but I know not all. I am trying lose weight now and its difficult. Any advice? I eat healthy and I am a vegetarian and I have been busting my butt to work out and nothing.
title: menopause at 28
